/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/format.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/linux_parser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/my_utility.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/ncurses_display.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/process.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/processor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/system.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/test01.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/test02.cpp.o CMakeFiles/monitor.dir/src/test03.cpp.o  -o monitor -lcurses -lform
